popup_settings_position_caption.message: Place the sidebar and the toggle either on the right or the left by clicking on their position in the layout.

get_started_begin.message: To get started, enter a word into the search box and click on any dictionary icon on the sidebar.

get_started_select.message: You can also look up words you select on web pages. To look up the selected word:

get_started_select_step1.message: open the menu by right-clicking on it and find the Mimic dictionary

get_started_select_step2.message: either choose a dictionary from the list or click on the “Add word or phrase” option to be taken to the sidebar

faq_show_panel_answer.message: To open the sidebar, click on the toggle with an arrow on the right or the left of the screen.

faq_unpin_panel_question.message: - disable the sidebar for other web pages

faq_unpin_panel_answer.message: To hide the sidebar on other web pages, set the unpin position at the bottom of the sidebar.

faq_keep_open_answer.message: To keep the sidebar open on any web page, pin it by clicking the pin icon at the bottom of the sidebar.

faq_open_new_tab_question.message: - open a dictionary site in a new tab

faq_open_new_tab_answer.message: To open a dictionary site in a new window, click on the external link icon next to the dictionary button.

faq_change_position_question.message: - change the position of the sidebar on the screen

faq_change_position_answer.message: To choose the position of both the sidebar and the toggle, click on the position preferred in the layout in the Settings.

faq_change_theme_question.message: - switch the theme from light to dark

faq_change_theme_answer.message: To switch the dark theme on, move the slider forward in the Settings.

faq_reorder_question.message: - reorder the dictionaries on the sidebar

faq_reorder_answer.message: To change the order of the dictionaries, open the Dictionaries tab, click on the dictionary you’d like to replace and drag it where needed.

faq_disable_answer.message: To disable the sidebar, move the slider back in the Settings.

contact_glad.message: Is there anything we could add to make it helpful for you?

contact_has_question.message: Questions and suggestions are always welcome!

contact_support.message:
Do you like this extension?
You can support us here
